import { useState,useEffect } from 'react'; import React from "react"; import { BrowserRouter as Router, Link,useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import './Stock.css'; function StockCategory(props) { let { category } = useParams(); return (
{category}
{props.test}
No items
Apples
Oranges
); } export default StockCategory;
